H0.text: To attract mates is the purpose of a bird using flashy displays.

H1.text: To protect their territory is the purpose of a bird using flashy displays.

H2.text: To dissuade predators is the purpose of a bird using flashy displays.

H3.text: To signal feeding is the purpose of a bird using flashy displays.

A4.text: Males with the brightest plumage are favoured by females of multiple species of bird.

A5.text: Many bird species make use of mating calls, the females preferring males with songs that are complex and varied in amplitude, structure, and frequency.
